text: when it comes to Spain most people talk
about Barcelona or Ibiza but the capital
of Madrid has plenty of surprises to
offer are you guys ready to see this
let's hit it
[Music]
I've spent the last ten days in Madrid
the third largest city in the EU located
right in the heart of Spain while things
here might not impress you as much as
say the Colosseum in Rome or Parliament
and Budapest it's the overall vibe on
these streets that are unparalleled to
anywhere else in Europe Madrid has all
the amenities of a big capital city but
still holds on to its Spanish charm with
cobblestone streets family-owned stores
and the friendliest of people I came
here not knowing what to expect but
after being shown around by my buddy
Alvaro I quickly fell in love with
everything around me for three major
reasons tapas beautiful plazas and the
outdoor culture let's begin with tapas
the toughest and with family
small bite-sized snacks of Spanish
cuisine served hot or cold I know that
they can be found everywhere in Spain
but Madrid is the core of Spanish
culture and therefore they are arguably
the best they're also really cheap like
$1 per plate nobody can come to Madrid
without noticing it's plazas or open
urban spaces lined with cafes shops
beautiful architecture and lots of
people my favorite one here is Plaza
maior which dates back to the 15th
century when it was constructed as a
bustling market plazas are the best
place to people watch and enjoy the
sunshine which leads me to my last point
Maude rellenos loved the outdoors
thanks to 300 days of sunshine per year
locals love to walk around dine on the
sidewalks or exercise in the park
the inner city is even closed to outside
vehicles providing even more comfort for
everyone to relax in the Sun which in
the summertime illuminates the city
until 10:30 p.m. Madrid is just awesome
and sort of checks all the boxes for
what makes a city enjoyable now the real
question is are you gonna come here and
see what it's like for yourself
[Music]
I've spent the last ten days in Madrid
the third largest city in the EU located
right in the heart
damnit that's a blooper though that's a
blooper that's a blooper
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
